DOC.brief_summary: There are no differences between the exams made with the new device,that evaluates the hearing, and the device gold standard, that is widely used in clinics and hospitals.
DOC.brief_title: The Normal Standard of Brainstem Auditory Evoked Potential in Adults Using a New Device
DOC.criteria: hearing thresholds less than 25 dB at all frequencies of pure tone audiometry, with differences between the ears, by frequency, or less than 10 dB. The group with bilateral sensorineural hearing loss was made up of adults with hearing thresholds changed from 25 to 60 dB HL for the frequencies 20008000 Hz for pure tone audiometry.
